content: woolfull crochet pattern waffle stitch baby blanket waffle stitch baby blanket before you start pattern is in us terms you will need a 4mm crochet hook and a needle for weaving in ends yarn - three 150g balls of stylecraft special candy swirl dk shade used is coconut ice to start chain 150 row 1 - double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in next stitch and each stitch to end of row row 2 - turn ch3 double_crochet in next stitch fpdc around next stitch double_crochet in next 2 fpdc double_crochet in next 2 repeat to end double_crochet in turning chain row 3 - turn ch3 double_crochet in next stitch fpdc around next 2 stitches double_crochet fpdc fpdc repeat to end with fpdc around turning chain row 4 - turn ch3 double_crochet in next stitch fpdc around next stitch double_crochet in next 2 fpdc double_crochet in next 2 repeat to end double_crochet in turning chain repeat row 3 and 4 until blanket measures approx 25 inches square end on a row 4 border turn ch2 2hdc in same space half_double_crochet in each stitch along row 3hdc in corner stitch half_double_crochet in each row end 3hdc in corner stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch of starting chain 3hdc in corner stitch half_double_crochet in each row end slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet and fasten_off copyright woolfull 2017 all rights reserved
